import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { CartProvider } from './CartProvider'; function Menu() { const { cart } = useProvider(CartProvider); const numItems = cart ? cart.reduce((total, item) => total + item.quantity, 0) : 0; return(
